snippet: Joaquim Rodríguez is in prime position to win the Vuelta a España after holding off Alberto Contador in the most demanding leg of the race.
abstract: Spanish cyclist Joaquim Rodriguez is in prime position to win the Vuelta a Espana after holding off Alberto Contador in the most demanding leg of the race; Italy's Dario Cataldo wins the mountainous 16th stage.
lead_paragraph: Joaquim Rodríguez is in prime position to win the Vuelta a España after holding off Alberto Contador in the most demanding leg of the race.

headline.seo: Joaquim Rodríguez Extends Vuelta a España Lead
